General.Name: Pharnext SA
General.Description: Pharnext SA, a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company, engages in the development of therapies for neurodegenerative diseases with high unmet medical needs. Its products include PXT3003, a novel fixed-dose synergistic combination of baclofen, naltrexone, and sorbitol formulated that is in Phase III clinical trials for the treatment of Charcot-Marie-tooth disease type 1A; and PXT864 to treat amyotrophic lateral sclerosis. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Paris, France.

2.Name: Mr. Ilya  Chumakov Ph.D., D-Sc
2.Title: Co-Founder, Chairman of Scientific Advisory Board and Director
